products.name: Dell xps insperion 13inch laptop
products.description: The MacBook Pro is a line of Macintosh notebook computers by by Apple Inc. Introduced in January 2006, it is the higher-end model of the MacBook family, sitting above the consumer-focused MacBook Air. It is currently sold with 13-inch, 14-inch, and 16-inch screens, all using variants of the Apple-designed M1 system on a chip.
